screenTime.information.first: This application displays the time that the student spends on the laptop provided by the Bouches-du-Rhône Department.
screenTime.information.second: Screen time calculation requires the laptop to have Internet access.
screenTime.information.fourth: This feature does not record any personal usage or internet browsing data.
screenTime.error.generic: A technical issue has occurred. Please refresh the page. If the problem persists, contact your school’s IT administrator.
screenTime.error.404: No data found for this user.
screenTime.error.noUser: No user available to display screen time data.
